name: sturdy

effect.sword-shield: Does not prevent regular KOs from full HP.
effect.the-isle-of-armor: Does not prevent regular KOs from full HP.
effect.the-crown-tundra: Does not prevent regular KOs from full HP.
effect.brilliant-diamond-and-shining-pearl: Does not prevent regular KOs from full HP.
effect.legends-arceus: Does not prevent regular KOs from full HP.

short_effect: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead. Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.

flavor_text.sword-shield: It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
